title: Modern R&B Producer Keys
description: Keyboard techniques for R&B and hip-hop production. Lo-fi chords, trap soul progressions, and the sounds behind modern hits, expanded with 2025 vocal processing and beat trends for full track mastery.

modules.title: Lo-Fi & Chill Chords
modules.description: The dreamy, nostalgic sounds of lo-fi hip-hop, with ear training for textures.

lessons.title: Lo-Fi Chord Stacks
lessons.description: Creating lush, jazzy chords for beats.

theory_content.summary: Lo-fi uses warm, imperfect chords for vibe.

exercises.title: Lo-Fi ii-V-I
exercises.description: Dm9 - G13 - Cmaj9 with lo-fi voicings.

lessons.title: Detuned Piano Sound
lessons.description: Create lo-fi detune effects, with 2025 sound design updates.

lessons.title: Sample Chops in Lo-Fi
lessons.description: Chop samples for R&B, with 2025 sampling techniques.

modules.title: Trap Soul Progressions
modules.description: Dark, emotional progressions used in modern R&B, with 2025 808 updates.

lessons.title: The Trap Soul Sound
lessons.description: Bryson Tiller, 6LACK, and the melancholic minor vibe.

theory_content.summary: Trap soul blends R&B with trap beats.

exercises.title: Classic Trap Soul Progression
exercises.description: Am9 - Fmaj7 - Cmaj7 - G with 808 bass in mind.

lessons.title: 808 Bass Awareness
lessons.description: Integrate 808s with keys, with 2025 sub-bass trends.

lessons.title: Hi-Hat Syncopation
lessons.description: Add trap rhythms to keys, with 2025 hi-hat patterns.

modules.title: Full Production
modules.description: Build full tracks with 2025 vocal and mix trends from SoundOracle.

theory_content.summary: Production adds reverb, delay for atmospheric sound.

exercises.title: Produce a Loop
exercises.description: Create MIDI loop with min11 and Dilla groove.
exercises.midi_prompt: Generate full MIDI loop with effects sim

lessons.title: Vocal Support in Full Track
lessons.description: Integrate vocals with keys, with 2025 processing.

exercises.title: Original R&B Track
exercises.description: Complete production with vocal and mix.

description: From triads to advanced reharms for gospel.
